name: Block Bomber
description:
Block Bomber is a fast-paced block-bustin' game where you move blocks around to create lines of matching shapes, then blow them up with bombs!

Controls: (Keyboard/XBox Controller)

X /A- Button 1 (Grab n' Drop Blocks)

C/X - Button 2 (Place n' Activate Bombs)

Spacebar/Start - Pause

Ctrl/Select - Speed Up Block Spawning

Arrow Keys/D-Pad - Move Cursor/Navigate Menus.
